entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Asylum seekers in your concentration camps are at high risk of being infected with #Coronavirus & you do nothing. Children, adults and families. You are a heartless racist dictator and history will never remember you kindly. #TrumpIsTheWORSTPresidentEVER
